thread.title: Janet Street Porter 'not surprised at all' about Paul Burrell coming out as gay following his divorce
thread.title_full: Janet Street Porter 'not surprised at all' about Paul Burrell coming out as gay following his divorce

author: Hayley Minn
title: Janet Street Porter 'not surprised at all' about Paul Burrell coming out as gay following his divorce
text:
TV Janet Street Porter 'not surprised at all' about Paul Burrell coming out as gay following his divorce The Loose Women panelist spent three weeks in the I'm A Celebrity jungle with Princess Diana's former butler Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Janet Street Porter 'not surprised' Paul Burrell has come out Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Janet Street Porter has confessed she’s “not surprised at all” about Paul Burrell coming out as gay. 
The Loose Women panellist spent three weeks in the I’m A Celebrity jungle with Princess Diana’s former butler – who announced he’s getting married to his male partner of nine months yesterday. 
Janet explained she always thought he was quite a “flamboyant” character on the ITV daytime show. 
She said: “I’m not surprised at all. Janet Street Porter has said she wasn't surprised about Paul Burrell coming out (Photo: ITV) She lived with him in the jungle for three weeks (Photo: Rex Features) 
“I spent three weeks with him, and he’s a very flamboyant character. 
“We had to do this talent show, and he dyed his shirt pink and ripped the sleeves off.” 
The 58-year-old announced he's marrying his boyfriend, lawyer Graham Cooper, in an intimate ceremony in the Lake District, just nine months after divorcing his wife. 
And it was previously revealed Princess Diana was the only woman who knew Paul was gay. She said he was very flamboyant (Photo: ITV) 
Paul was married to Maria for 32 years and they have two sons together. 
They have, however, been living apart for years, with Paul running a flower shop in Farndon, Cheshire and Maria, 62, living in Florida. 
Diana's 'rock' Paul Burrell reveals he's marrying his boyfriend - nine months after divorcing wife (Photo: Mirrorpix) 
Following the announcement, it's been reported that Diana , who described Paul as her "rock", was the only woman he told about his sexuality. 
A source told The Sun : “Paul’s friends and family all know but for a long time he kept it a closely guarded secret. 
“And for a time, literally nobody knew. He did share it with Diana while he worked with her because they were so close. 
“But at the time she was the only woman he felt he could tell.” Like us on Facebook
